no.ntnu.okse.core.subscription

Class SubscriptionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.okse.core.AbstractCoreService
      • no.ntnu.okse.core.subscription.SubscriptionService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TopicChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WSNSubscriptionManagerTest.TestSubscriptionService

    public class SubscriptionService
extends AbstractCoreService
implements TopicChangeListener
    Created by Aleksander Skraastad (myth) on 4/5/15.

    okse is licenced under the MIT licence.

      • startScheduledRemovalOfExpiredSubscribersAndPublishers

        private void startScheduledRemovalOfExpiredSubscribersAndPublishers()
        This method starts a scheduled job that periodically removes expired subscribers and publishers from the SubscriptionService registry. Delegates its work to the purgeExpiredSubscribersAndPublishers() method.

      • purgeExpiredSubscribersAndPublishers

        private void purgeExpiredSubscribersAndPublishers()
        Purge expired Subscribers and Publishers. This method should be run as a periodic job, and it delegates the actual removal to the removeSubscriber and removePublisher methods, that in turn injects the operations as SubscriptionTask into the task queue.

      • insertTask

        private void insertTask(SubscriptionTask task)
        This helper method injects a task into the task queue and handles interrupt exceptions
        Parameters:
        task - The SubscriptionTask to be executed

      • getAllSubscribers

        public java.util.HashSet<Subscriber> getAllSubscribers()
        Retrive a HashSet of all subscribers on the broker. This HashSet is a shallow clone of the internal data structure, preventing unintended modification.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of Subscriber objects that have subscribed on the broker

      • getAllPublishers

        public java.util.HashSet<Publisher> getAllPublishers()
        Retrieve a HashSet of all publishers on the broker. This HashSet is a shallow clone of the internal data structure, preventing unintended modification.
        Returns:
        A HashSet of Publisher objects that have registered on the broker
